text: Kɛlɛ kɔɔɠɔ nui gooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma: «Ɓa-o, anɛɛ ni wali ɠae waagila (1.000) ka ɗa la kɔɠɔ, è fe zèa, gè la kɛa, gè ʋa yeelo masagi ná-doun zunui ma, mazɔlɔɔ gi goomɛnini, é fali nii wo wo ma, ɗa-o, Aɓisayi-yo, ta Itayi, é ɠɛ wo ma: ‹À dama ga nu nɔpɛ ge mina faa ɲɔu ɠɛ ga zunu loungoi Aɓasalɔme.›
